description:
A friend and classmate of Tasuke and company.
When we first met Shouko, she is often called a delinquent or troublemaker, but she`s actually good at heart, and a firm supporter of Shao, who doesn`t easily grasp things about love. But there are times when she puts odd things in Shao`s mind.
An anomaly in "Shugogetten!"`s main characters, she doesn`t have romantic interests unlike the other characters.
From: AnimeNfo
name: Yamanobe Shouko
